title: Change the case of strings
sql:
with rws as (
  select 'SQL is awesome!' str from dual
)
  select 
    lower ( str ) lowercase, 
    upper ( str ) uppercase, 
    initcap ( str ) capital_case
  from   rws;
  
LOWERCASE       UPPERCASE       CAPITAL_CASE   
--------------- --------------- ---------------
sql is awesome! SQL IS AWESOME! Sql Is Awesome!
